chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Set
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall p q : list (Term A n), minusP (pO A n) p q -> q = mults multA (n:=n) (invTerm invA (n:=n) (T1 A1 n)) p

Premises:
Inductive minusP : list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> Prop := mnillu1 : forall l1 : list (Term A n), minusP (pO A n) l1 (mults multA (n:=n) (invTerm invA (n:=n) (T1 A1 n)) l1) | mnillu2 : forall l1 : list (Term A n), minusP l1 (pO A n) l1 | mmainu1 : forall (a1 a2 : Term A n) (l1 l2 l3 : list (Term A n)), ltT (A:=A) ltM a2 a1
T1 : forall A : Set, A -> forall n : nat, Term A n
CoefStructure : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A), A -> forall eqA : A -> A -> Prop, (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) -> Prop
OrderStructure : forall A : Set, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> (A -> A -> A) -> Prop
mult_mon : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon d -> mon d
Inductive mon : nat -> Set := n_0 : mon 0 | c_n : forall d : nat, nat -> mon d -> mon (S d) Arguments mon _%nat_scope Arguments c_n (_ _)%nat_scope
mults : forall A : Set, (A -> A -> A) -> forall n : nat, Term A n -> list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n)
pO : forall (A : Set) (n : nat), list (Term A n)
zero_mon : forall d : nat, mon d
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
invTerm : forall A : Set, (A -> A) -> forall n : nat, Term A n -> Term A n

pluspf_inv1 : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> forall (a b : Term A n)...

```coq
intros p q H.
induction H.
- rewrite <- (pluspf_assoc A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p (pO A n) (mults multA (n:=n) (invTerm invA (n:=n) (T1 A1 n)) p)).
  apply eqp_pluspf_com_l.
  rewrite <- (pO_pluspf_inv1 A A0 eqA plusA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p).
  auto.
- rewrite <- (pluspf_assoc A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec q (pO A n) (mults multA (n:=n) (invTerm invA (n:=n) (T1 A1 n)) q)).
  apply eqp_pluspf_com_r.
  rewrite <- (pO_pluspf_inv2 A A0 eqA plusA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec q).
  auto.
- rewrite <- (pluspf_assoc A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec l2 (pO A n) (mults multA (n:=n) (invTerm invA (n:=n) (T1 A1 n)) l3)).
  apply eqp_pluspf_com_l.
  rewrite <- (pO_pluspf_inv1 A A0 eqA plusA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec l2).
  auto.
Qed.

original: intros p q H. induction H. - rewrite <- (pluspf_assoc A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p (pO A n) (mults multA (n:=n) (invTerm invA (n:=n) (T1 A1 n)) p)). apply eqp_pluspf_com_l. rewrite <- (pO_pluspf_inv1 A A0 eqA plusA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p). auto. - rewrite <- (pluspf_assoc A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec q (pO A n) (mults multA (n:=n) (invTerm invA (n:=n) (T1 A1 n)) q)). apply eqp_pluspf_com_r. rewrite <- (pO_pluspf_inv2 A A0 eqA plusA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec q). auto. - rewrite <- (pluspf_assoc A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec l2 (pO A n) (mults multA (n:=n) (invTerm invA (n:=n) (T1 A1 n)) l3)). apply eqp_pluspf_com_l. rewrite <- (pO_pluspf_inv1 A A0 eqA plusA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec l2). auto.
